HomePage.title: Advertising campaigns have never been easier.
HomePage.description: Suite-E Pub Solution is a digital marketing platform that allows businesses to create and manage advertising campaigns on WhatsApp.

hero.title: Boost Your Business with WhatsApp Marketing
hero.subtitle: Suiite-Pub empowers Cameroonian businesses to connect directly with customers through automated WhatsApp campaigns.

dashboard.title: Your dashboard is the heart of your campaign
dashboard.description: Our dashboard provides you with all the tools you need to manage your campaigns, track performance, and optimize your strategies for maximum impact.

signupForm.privacyNotice: By signing up, I agree to the

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.username: Username must be at least 3 characters.
validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.passwordFormat: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (@$!%*?&).
validation.confirmPasswordLength: Confirm password must be at least 8 characters.
